name: media
schema:
CREATE TABLE `media` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`media_type` text NOT NULL,
	`author` text,
	`organization` text,
	`published_at` integer,
	`url` text,
	`file` text,
	`file_size` integer,
	`thumbnail` text,
	`event_name` text,
	`event_date` integer,
	`is_featured` integer DEFAULT false,
	`featured_order` integer,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`media_type`) REFERENCES `media_types`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`organization`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
